The Negotiations of the embassadors sent to the Duke of Savoy by the Protestant Swiss-Cantons, in favour of the distressed Vaudois wherein there are many things very curious, and some letters never before published / translated out of French. Boyer, P. (Pierre), 1619-ca. 1700.
[2], 158, [10] p.
Printed for R. Bentley ..., London : 1691.
Attributed by Wing to Pierre Boyer. Advertisements: 10 p. at end. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
